meanings.definition: The quality of being willing to take risks or try new things.
meanings.sent1: Her adventurousness led her to explore unknown lands.
meanings.sent2: His adventurousness in trying new foods always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent3: The adventurousness of trying a new hobby paid off with new friends.
meanings.sent4: The adventurousness of her spirit soared like a fearless bird.
meanings.sent5: The adventurousness of his ideas sparked creativity in the team.

meanings.definition: A willingness to engage in exciting or unusual activities.
meanings.sent1: Their adventurousness in trying extreme sports was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The group's adventurousness made every outing unforgettable.
meanings.sent3: The adventurousness of their plan to build a treehouse amused the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: Her adventurousness in fashion choices was like a burst of color in a dull room.
meanings.sent5: The adventurousness of his taste in music made him stand out from the crowd.
